mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ucs_enterprise ( tenant_id, enterprise_name, credit_code, industry_type, enterprise_type, region, enterprise_size, charge_person, position, phone, email, status, remarks, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{tenantId}, #{enterpriseName}, #{creditCode}, #{industryType}, #{enterpriseType}, #{region}, #{enterpriseSize}, #{chargePerson}, #{position}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{status}, #{remarks}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted} )
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM ucs_enterprise WHERE enterprise_name=#{enterpriseName}

SELECT id, enterprise_name FROM ucs_enterprise WHERE id IN ( SELECT enterprise_id FROM ucs_user_enterprise WHERE user_id = #{userId}
)
SELECT se.* FROM ucs_enterprise se LEFT JOIN ucs_user_enterprise sue ON se.id = sue.enterprise_id WHERE sue.user_id = #{userId} AND se.id = #{enterpriseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ucs_user_enterprise(user_id, enterprise_id, create_times) VALUES (#{userId}, #{id},#{time})
mapper.select: SELECT sue.enterprise_id AS enterpriseId, se.enterprise_name AS enterpriseName, sue.create_times AS createTime, sue.department_id AS departmentId, sd.dept_name AS departmentName, sue.status AS status FROM ucs_user_enterprise sue LEFT JOIN ucs_dept sd ON sd.id = sue.department_id LEFT JOIN ucs_enterprise se ON se.id = sue.enterprise_id WHERE sue.user_id = #{userId} /*AND sue.isOpen = "1"*/
